title: Outhue
author: Outhue
content: If someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?Why did they go around looking for people to teach? This is why experience after following a friend to a gambling group on telegram, but I am not ready to take the step in any other their predictions..My question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? Because I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?If a punter is not an addict and not gambling too much, but gamble occasionally and look for a better matches to stake on or gamble on better casino games, he may likely win than lose if he uses the right strategies and analyses. But it is good to know that gambling is just about the matter of luck because if he wins, he is only lucky. And because he wins most of the time, there are days of disappointment too. And another thing is that a gambler may win more for sometimes and later lose more. Gambling is just gambling, a gambler telling others that he is winning more is just rubbish because gambling is luck and very risky.Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMWhy did they go around looking for people to teach? This is why experience after following a friend to a gambling group on telegram, but I am not ready to take the step in any other their predictions..I have noticed this in trading, so not a surprise to see that people are doing it for gambling too. They know people are not wise there are many people that can fall victim of them and be scammed. If the person pay them and they teach him, with him continuing to lose would be when he will know that he has been scammed. Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMMy question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? Because I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever.Do not believe on any group, you can just be there to check their free predictions. If it comes to money, avoid or you will be scammed. Go to prediction sites, analyse some matches yourself and just pick like one or two matches and be good, rather than to be depending on someone.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?That is simple logic to prove to you that is fallacy. If you have a winning strategy in gambling, you don't want to bring it out publicly. For example when you get to offline gambling house you see bettors who win at least average of 50% but such people don't give out same games that will win but they can give out less probable winning games and conceal their real winning games. You hear such people cashing out the next day while your game given to you by them will fail. That is the reality of life.Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMWhy did they go around looking for people to teach? This is why experience after following a friend to a gambling group on telegram, but I am not ready to take the step in any other their predictions..Your getting to a telegram group may be good for you to have an experience that will help you understand what is happening there. Example if you don't pay you are not given certain games, you just get average games like free prediction but both paid games and free games have no guarantee.Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMMy question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? Because I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever. Not really winning games because nobody is certainly giving you such. They research them from other prediction sites and compare with their knowledge of the games and collect fees from you as you register. They have different levels of registration up to VIP and VVIP

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: You can search the internet and find many places to buy sports picks and find that most of the guys selling the picks have a 70%+ win rate. Wunderdog.com is such a place. They cannot, nor will any telegram or forum group be able to guarantee you a win. They use their knowledge on a certain sport and give you a reasonable statement as to why a team will win. Most of your telegram groups are just people hoping to get lucky on their picks, you see the same here on the forum. These people disappear pretty quickly as they go on a massive red streak and noone wants to follow them anymore. Basically, stay away from the group unless you are just following them for a little extra fun. Don't join hoping they will make you a millionaire in a month.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?Greed is what fuel their desire to recruit new people to sell there so called strategy to because of gambling is understood properly,  no one will fall for the ethics since we already know that there is nothing like a consistent stride in gambling and if you win it means you are lucky and at the same time if you lose it goes the same way too. So it is better not to trust any strategy that is advertised as proven winning mechanism because it not always true and those involve in those scheme are aware of that,  but choose to deceive newbies who are looking for sure strategy when there is none.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMMy question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? Because I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever. Hey let's give them the benefit of the doubt and well, they're just really nice people who is looking to build a community of sports gamblers. But well to say that there's isn't a legit sports betting group that gives out calls is fake, is kind of, well, fake imo. But, it's simply a chance that doesn't really make you change or turn your life around imo. There's legit groups out there most likely, probably a community of people who really like numbers and statistics that offer advice, you'd be surprised by how much free time some people have. At the same time there's also probably a lot of other people who's going to use that to scam people in the worst case, or manipulate/skew the odds in their favor by using ignorant people.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?Why did they go around looking for people to teach? This is why experience after following a friend to a gambling group on telegram, but I am not ready to take the step in any other their predictions..My question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? Because I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever. There are legit groups in the sense that they already tell you that they don't guarantee you any results and you bet on your own risk and usually there are a couple of good telegram channels.They usually win more than they lose but as I said they cannot guarantee you any profit in the long term,you can also join them and have a look at their stats because most of them keep statistics or the ones more advanced send you daily notifications,I don't remember the names of such channels as I used to use them some long ago but I know they are there for anyone who want to have an idea of what other people think of betting in sport in general.

comments.author: Issa56
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?Have being thinking about it also, am surprising when I see people claiming they are selling fixed matches, must of them ended up spamming peoples Dm, but I know if those people are real, they wont be wasting their time looking for people they will sell their signal to instead they will keep on using it to multiply their wealth. Lets be honest nobody will want to expose where they are truly making money from just to random people online, if those people are really having the strategy which they claimed, then they wont want to sell it because they will believe it can be exposed at any moment.

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: There are many and there is no guarantee that they will be accurate, and most of them telegram groups are scam, i am not into gambling that much but I have a brother that spends most of his time gambling online and he has once put me about a group online that gives some gambling signals aka (bet calls) but later he told me that he has tried his luck five times through the same group and is not working as he hoped it will. Its either you get scammed through those so called gambling group, because most of them are trying to scam people or they're just like you who have nothing but prediction to make and sometimes it will go your way and sometimes it won't go your way. Few of them are useful for people who don't have time to study or read about a particular sport for example football you need to be attentive and know what is currently happening around the club that he wants to bet your money on but this type of groups make things easier for people that don't have time to sit at the TV and study some sports you know, for informations.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: I honestly don't know, because I've never joined any gambling group because I really don't intend to do so, and that's because I can't trust anyone that call them have the right strategy that can give them more wins than losses, and invitations like that are similar as traders who sell signals do because they understand that it is easier to make money selling signals than to trade using what they believe will be profitable.It is better for gamblers not to believe in such things because in sports betting there is no such thing as a certainty of winning, even though we have tried to analyze it carefully, the outcome of the match is not in accordance with what we predicted.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Z390 on June 26, 2023, 10:09:35 AMFew of them are useful for people who don't have time to study or read about a particular sport for example football you need to be attentive and know what is currently happening around the club that he wants to bet your money on but this type of groups make things easier for people that don't have time to sit at the TV and study some sports you know, for informations.On another hand some other pundits use them to compare others. Like they join different of such group but they belong to the free signal section to see what is being predicted there and they use them alongside with what they see from some other groups, they compare and contrast before staking their bet. These are the class of people who do betting for a living, they have the time to research on all that they want to bet. They sometimes compare idea with other bettors and doing such has higher chances of success sometimes but if you rely on just what was predicted without your personal effort then you may likely just be paying call fees with no benefit.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMMy question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? There are betting sites that make provisions for sports predictions on their site, some platforms may only make use of their website for such information updates through email updates if subscribed for or through message on their line, making a call across their users may not be that effective because of the demands it may requires in doing that.Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMBecause I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever. Making such provisions is not a guarantee that your bet must come as expected but they just have a more provisioned with more opportunities to increase their ability to win gambling.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?Whenever you see or hear people claiming that they have a strategy that can guarantee you 100% for something that has to do with chance just know that there a 99.9% possibility that such person wants to scam you.QuoteWhy did they go around looking for people to teach? This is why experience after following a friend to a gambling group on telegram, but I am not ready to take the step in any other their predictions..My question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? Because I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever. There don't have anything to offer all they are seeking for is someone who would be gullible enough to believe them.I have seen them before on twitter, facebook, telegram and even on some whatsapp TV status they always come with some proof of them winning and never lost a single bet, and tell you all kinds of sweet stuffs like they will reduce your registration fee blah blah blah. I have never join and never will, I just look at all of them as scammers and up till this day I haven't seen anyone that has joiend their channel that came to testify about their winnings.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?From my understanding I don't think that anyone can have a 100% strategy of winning more that losing. Gambling is for fun and there is no way one can win most times. You can never be lucky most times. Gambling can't change anyone's life because he will continue gambling.QuoteWhy did they go around looking for people to teach? This is why experience after following a friend to a gambling group on telegram, but I am not ready to take the step in any other their predictions..I guess that they also know that the games might not be as predicted,so they don't want to lose alone and that if why they are selling out their predictions so that they can make profit,if the game don't work out as predicted. They don't want to take the risk all alone.QuoteMy question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? Because I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever. They only make research based on past matches and history of both clubs involved and comes out with their prediction. I don't think that they are very sure with their prediction because they know that it isn't easy to predict correctly. This is why they tell people to see if it will work,because if they know that it will definitely work,they wouldn't tell anyone. Or they are greedy and wants more money.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?Why did they go around looking for people to teach? This is why experience after following a friend to a gambling group on telegram, but I am not ready to take the step in any other their predictions..My question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? Because I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever. Precisely the same question to the signal sellers. They create a secret group and sell their crypto signals to their subscriber. If they know the market movement, why don't they open a big position and change their lives? Why they have sold their so-called crypto signals to people to make money?  This is among the most selling scam courses or subscriptions people still buy. There is no profit guarantee in the crypto market or any business. This is another case of dumb and dumber. People who buy their service can be considered dumber people. It's like a bald-headed guy selling medicine to other bald head people to grow their hair.

comments.author: Sakanwa
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?Why did they go around looking for people to teach? This is why experience after following a friend to a gambling group on telegram, but I am not ready to take the step in any other their predictions..My question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? Because I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever.  I came a across a famous punter on twitter called mayor he's very good with his predictions and chances of winning his predictions are very high and he usually does some sort of giveaways to his followers thereby assisting them with funds to stake on his predictions, he has a high staking power and if you register into any of the bookies sites he operates with, you stand a chance of getting double the amount of your first deposit into the site.    Well you're right because most  of this punters don't share all their winning strategies to their followers, cause they believe this bookies would take note of it and block the options, because the sites is a business for the bookies owners and they won't want to keep loosing. However what some punters normally do is drop a random game options with high chances of winning and ask their subjects to edit to smaller odds and stake high, it works most of the time but some people out of greed would want to make larger profits and end up losing.

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.created_time: June 26, 2023, 11:22:26 AMLast edit: June 26, 2023, 06:53:00 PM by QueenVera
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?Why did they go around looking for people to teach? This is why experience after following a friend to a gambling group on telegram, but I am not ready to take the step in any other their predictions..My question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? Because I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever. Well I believe  there are very legit bet group that gives atleast upto 85 percent predictions and for anything that has fake, simply should have an original  that the fake is copying from.Whatever the case might be, I was at some point almost wondering same thing like you did to wondering why someone who has a winning strategy  that is real be sharing it out to everyone when he could make some good use of it but the truth is that money never satisfies and I believe  it was the quest for money that lead him to finding that strategy and since money never satisfies, he might want to receive  some more money by getting more people involved and you know that most of this groups aren't free.There are legit groups but I think they're  been overshadowed by the fake ones.

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?Why did they go around looking for people to teach? This is why experience after following a friend to a gambling group on telegram, but I am not ready to take the step in any other their predictions..Perfect answer to be told by those guys claiming that they have good strategy that could help anyone to win on their bets. Since if there's really a perfect one for them for sure they will not share it and also they became greedy to bet more then make their selves more richer. This is so obvious thoughts to think about since its so shady why they want to invite more people. Their main intention is to scam a large number of people so for other thinking to seek for sporst tipster group they should avoid this idea because there's no perfect group that can give them a 90%-100% winning rate.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMIf someone claimed they have the right strategy for gambling and winning more times than losing, why can't they use the strategy for themselves and change their lives first?I mean they didn’t lose their money if they share their strategy or the strategy itself isn’t gone after they share. They got extra profit from subscription which is a good income for the analysis work. This is not some kind of cheat code that gamblers use to take advantage on the casino. I don’t find it wrong to share instead of using it on their own.Quote from: Outhue on June 26, 2023, 07:11:39 AMWhy did they go around looking for people to teach? This is why experience after following a friend to a gambling group on telegram, but I am not ready to take the step in any other their predictions..My question for you my friends is are there sport betting groups that gives betting calls that are legit? Because I believe that if anyone knows a way to change their life around, they won't tell anyone, they will enjoy the moments and pray it last forever. Because of extra passive income from subscription or tips. It’s like a payday for a teacher that teaching their student. About legitimacy of sportsbetting call, I think your concern is about the accuracy of their picks which is subjective.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: QueenVera on June 26, 2023, 11:22:26 AMThere are legit groups but I they're  be overshadowed by the fake ones.When it comes to soccer as regards to such legit groups, they hardly give out three correct winning games constant and daily. So most times they can share one winning game and it is not out daily. Therefore, rate of there winning is not constant and not anywhere near 85%. Moreover, giving out just one game is not enough because majority of bettors are those who don't have huge pocket to take big financial risk to stake on just 1.30 odd (on A level teams like Madrid, Barcelona or PSG, Manchester city) for example because some of those "sure" games that those groups share out are already predicted winning games around the betting space, so a bettor need at least reasonable winning games like 3 different games to play for a reasonable potential winning. So you see it will become a thing of running around the circle
